1.0.0.name: wordpress/yith-woocommerce-ajax-navigation
1.0.0.description:
YITH WooCommerce Ajax Navigation allows you to filter the products in the Shop page without reloading the page. The plugin also includes two new types of Product Attributes visualizations: Color and Label. With Color display type you're able to assign a color (selected from a Color Picker) to each Product Attributes. With Label Color display you're able to assign a label (3 chars max) to your Product Attributes.

Working demos are available here: LIVE DEMO 1 - LIVE DEMO 2

Full documentation is available here.

Installation

Once you have installed the plugin, you just need to activate the plugin in order to enable it.
